This package contains functions and colour palettes that enable you to create e61 Institute themed graphs and know what colours to use in other applications.

### Installing theme61

If you haven't already, install the `remotes` package:

`install.packages("remotes")`

Then install from GitHub:

`remotes::install_github("e61-institute/theme61", dependencies = TRUE, upgrade = "always")`

Then load into R:

`library(theme61)`

### Making the best use of the features

See the [package website](https://e61-institute.github.io/theme61/) to learn how to use the package features.
